verses.t: I will lift up{H5375} mine eyes{H5869} unto the hills{H2022}, from whence{H370} cometh{H935} my help{H5828}.I willâ€¦: or, Shall I lift up mine eyes to the hills? whence should my help come?
My help{H5828} cometh Lordfrom the {H3068}, which made{H6213} heaven{H8064} and earth{H776}.
He will not suffer{H5414} thy foot{H7272} to be moved{H4132}: he that keepeth{H8104} thee will not slumber{H5123}.
Behold, he that keepeth{H8104} Israel{H3478} shall neither slumber{H5123} nor sleep{H3462}.
LordThe {H3068} is thy keeper{H8104}: Lordthe {H3068} is thy shade{H6738} upon thy right{H3225} hand{H3027}.
The sun{H8121} shall not smite{H5221} thee by day{H3119}, nor the moon{H3394} by night{H3915}.
LordThe {H3068} shall preserve{H8104} thee from all evil{H7451}: he shall preserve{H8104} thy soul{H5315}.
LordThe {H3068}shall preserve{H8104} thy going out{H3318} and thy coming in{H935} from this time forth, and even for{H5704} evermore{H5769}.
